root.name: Sex Sim
root.description: SexSim is a virtual 3D sex simulation. The game offers a possibility to create own virtual world. Build 3D girls using simply editor with tabs: girls, partners, clothes, extras and places. First and second tabs describe virtual models, allows to change look, shapes, sizes of body parts. When models are ready, choose sexy clothes and adult extras, such as pantyhose, underwear, stockings, high heel shoes... In the end select location where you will have fun with your partners.
